column3: @hebasto Can you combine this PR  and #13999 into #13998. Given that all three are small changes to the same file, 3 separate PRs isn't necessary, and having all the changes in a single PR makes for easier testing. You can keep the 3 individual commits.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->Note to reviewers: This pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #13998 (Scripts and tools: fix error message if Docker installed already by hebasto)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
@fanquake This PR has been combined into #13998.
